test_prompts.name: Calculator CLI
test_prompts.prompt: Create a simple calculator CLI tool that supports basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) and handles errors gracefully

test_prompts.name: Todo List Manager
test_prompts.prompt: Create a command-line todo list manager with features to add, remove, list, and mark tasks as complete. Store tasks in a JSON file

test_prompts.name: REST API for Books
test_prompts.prompt: Create a RESTful API for managing a book library with endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting books. Use FastAPI and include SQLite database

test_prompts.name: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
test_prompts.prompt: Create a tic-tac-toe game with a simple CLI interface supporting two players on the same device, with win/draw detection and game restart functionality

test_prompts.name: Number Guessing Game
test_prompts.prompt: Create a number guessing game where the computer picks a random number and the player tries to guess it with hints (higher/lower). Track attempts and score

test_prompts.name: CSV Data Analyzer
test_prompts.prompt: Create a CSV data analyzer tool that can read CSV files, display statistics (mean, median, mode), filter data, and export results. Include data visualization with matplotlib

test_prompts.name: News Scraper
test_prompts.prompt: Create a web scraper that extracts news headlines and summaries from a news website, stores them in JSON format, and provides search functionality. Use BeautifulSoup

test_prompts.name: File Organizer
test_prompts.prompt: Create a file organizer that automatically sorts files in a directory into subfolders based on file type (documents, images, videos, etc.) with undo functionality

test_prompts.name: URL Shortener
test_prompts.prompt: Create a URL shortener web application with Flask that generates short URLs, stores mappings in SQLite, and redirects to original URLs. Include analytics for click tracking

test_prompts.name: Simple Chatbot
test_prompts.prompt: Create a rule-based chatbot CLI that can answer FAQs about a product/service, handle greetings, and provide helpful responses. Include conversation logging and sentiment detection

usage_instructions.description: Test prompts for CrewAI Software Development Crew
usage_instructions.example: python main.py "Create a simple calculator CLI tool that supports basic arithmetic operations"
